components.description:
A curbside mailbox (letterbox, postbox) with its door latched shut and signal flag raised. Generally depicted in blue or gray with a red flag. Used for various content concerning postal deliveries and email.

Indicates in the United States that incoming mail (post) has been delivered. May also indicate that there is outgoing mail for pickup.

An early Apple design showed an open mailbox with an envelope, similar to its ðŸ“¬ Open Mailbox With Raised Flag design.

components.title: Closed Mailbox with Raised Flag

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.
